name: dumbbudget
description: DumbBudget is a simple budgeting and expense tracker built to be self-hosted. It lets users define categories, record transactions, and review monthly summaries through a clean, no-frills web dashboard.
features: Category management: Create custom spending categories to organize expenses according to your budget structure.
Transaction logging: Record income and expenses with date, amount, and category for accurate financial tracking.
Monthly summaries: View spending totals by category and compare against previous months to identify trends.
Budget limits: Set spending caps for each category and receive visual indicators when approaching limits.
Simple interface: Manage finances through a straightforward dashboard without complex features or navigation.
Data privacy: Store all financial information on your own server without sharing with external services.
Quick entry: Add transactions rapidly with minimal fields to capture expenses as they occur.
Export reports: Download transaction history and summaries for tax preparation or external analysis.
